headline.main: 2 U.S. Cruisers Hit, Says Japan, Admitting Damage in Attu Battle

lead_paragraph: Tokyo dispatches quoted by the German radio yesterday said that an unspecified number of Japanese cruisers were damaged "slightly" in last Friday's long-range battle with an American flotilla in the first surface action reported in the Aleurians area, The United Press reported.
abstract: Aleutians: Japanese admit damage to Jap cruisers, Attu battle; US planes raid Kiska
